Author: livipup
Text: Ugh, people are sk rude. Everyone accepts that if you grabbed an overweight person's fat and told them to eat less that you're an asshole, but when it comes to underweight people it's just fair game I guess. Nobody should be touching or commenting on somebody else's body without permission.
